com.digi.xbee.api.utils.srp

Class SrpUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.utils.srp.SrpUser

  • public class SrpUser
extends Object
    This class represents the user role in the Secure Remote Password protocol.
    Since:
    1.3.0

      • SrpUser

        public SrpUser(String username,
               String password)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new SrpUser object with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to authenticate.
        password - The password to authenticate.

    • Method Detail

      • getSessionKey

        public byte[] getSessionKey()
        Returns the session key.
        Returns:
        The session key, or null if it is not known yet.

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns whether the user is authenticated or not.
        Returns:
        true if the user is authenticated, false otherwise.

      • processChallenge

        public byte[] processChallenge(byte[] byte_s,
                               byte[] byte_B)
                        throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                               IOException
        Returns M1 if the challenge was successfully processed.
        Parameters:
        byte_s - Salt.
        byte_B - Public ephemeral value B.
        Returns:
        Proof of session key M1, or null if the challenge could not be processed.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a problem generating any value.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the hash algorithm to use does not exist.

      • startAuthentication

        public byte[] startAuthentication()
                           throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                  IOException
        Computes and returns A, which is needed to start authentication.
        Returns:
        Public ephemeral value A.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a problem generating 'byte k' value.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the hash algorithm to use does not exist.

      • verifySession

        public void verifySession(byte[] host_H_AMK)
        Verifies the given server proof of session key M2.
        Parameters:
        host_H_AMK - Proof of session key M2.
